{{for|the radio station|DXER}} {{Infobox_Broadcast | | call_letters = DXER-TV| | station_logo = | station_slogan = ''Para Sa'yo Kapatid''| | station_branding = ''TV5 General Santos''| | analog = 12 ([[VHF]])| | digital =| | affiliations = [[Associated Broadcasting Company|TV5]]| | founded = 1965| | location = [[General Santos City]]| | owner = [[Associated Broadcasting Company]]| | former_affiliations = BBC (1973-1986)| | sister station = [[DXEV-TV]] ([[AksyonTV|AksyonTV 38]])| | former_callsigns = | effective_radiated_power = 20 kilowatts | homepage = [http://www.tv5.com.ph/ www.tv5.com.ph] }} '''DXER-TV''', channel 12, is the [[Flagship (television)|flagship]] station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[Associated Broadcasting Company]]. Its studios are located at 3F R.A Building, South Osmena Street, General Santos City.
==See also== *[[Associated Broadcasting Company]] *[[List of Associated Broadcasting Company TV and radio stations]]
